page.title: 08Whitehills Daily Papers
page.content:
The two newspapers with widest coverage locally are {The Press & {Journal,} and {The Evening Express,} both dailies. They circulate all over the North of Scotland and include { {Local , National (Scottish), National {(U.K.) nad International News,}with regular features on {Farming, Fishing {and Oil.} All but one of the 'Banffie' news items (P.7) appeared also in the P. & J. earlier, but only one (the 'miracle' baby) on the front page.
{Circulation figures for the village: {Daily: 1. P. & J. 260 2. E.E 75/80 All other national dailies 105/110 (Plus 40/50 in summer) {Weekly: 3. Banffshire Journal 295 4. Fishing News 45/48 5. Farming News (Est.) 12 {(1 & 3 have almost total coverage)
